First aid information?: If in eyes, hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. If swallowed, call a poison control center or doctor immediately. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
How, where, and on what crop should I us: The product is not intended for use on crops. It is an insect repellent towelette to be used on skin and clothing. Apply a thin uniform film over all exposed skin except eyes and mouth. Apply sparingly around ears. Use just enough repellent to cover exposed skin and/or clothing. Do not use under clothing. Avoid over-application.
How does the product have to be stored o: Store this product in a cool, dry place that is inaccessible to children. If empty, do not reuse or refill the container. Offer for recycling, if available. If partly filled, call your local solid waste agency for disposal instructions. Never place unused product down any indoor or outdoor drain.
